example.eg: The ground was flat enough to put a chair on.
example.egtrans: 地面很平，可以把椅子放上去。

example.eg: The markets were flat today.
example.egtrans: 今天的市场没有什么起伏。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 没有起伏的，没有什么变化的

example.eg: The bike tyre is a little flat.  It needs to be pumped up.
example.egtrans: 自行车的车胎漏气了，需要加点气。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 没有气的, 漏了气的, 瘪下去的

example.eg: Josh found himself with a flat battery after leaving his car lights on.
example.egtrans: 乔什忘记关车灯，结果电瓶没电了。

example.eg: Lucy lay the fabric flat on the table ready to be cut.
example.egtrans: 露西将布铺在桌子上，准备剪裁。

example.eg: My flat is very small; it only has one bedroom.
example.egtrans: 我的公寓很小，只有一间卧室。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 公寓房, 租屋，政府租屋

example.eg: The car had a flat, so we had to stop to get a new tyre.
example.egtrans: 我们的车胎漏气了，所以得停下来换一个新胎。

example.eg: She went on a diet to regain her flat stomach.
example.egtrans: 为了小腹恢复平坦，她开始节食。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 扁平的, 平坦无赘肉的

example.eg: He lay flat so the enemy couldn't see him.
example.egtrans: 他平躺在地上，这样敌人就发现不了他。

example.eg: We expected a rich taste, but it was a little flat.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 淡而无味的, 口味平淡的

example.eg: The Coke was opened hours ago and it is now flat.
example.egtrans: 这瓶可乐是几小时前打开的，现在气已经跑完了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 跑气的, 没有泡沫的

example.eg: He issued a flat denial that he was gambling.
example.egtrans: 他断然否认自己在赌博。

example.eg: The speaker's delivery was flat and boring.
example.egtrans: 讲演者的演讲单调且乏味。

example.eg: The model is painted with flat paint, not glossy.
example.egtrans: 样品喷的是表面不反光的油漆，而非亮光漆。

example.eg: The next piece is in B-flat.
example.egtrans: 下一节是降B调。

example.eg: His voice was flat and he sounded awful.
example.egtrans: 他嗓音低沉，听起来很不舒服。

example.eg: The board was flat with the side of the house.
example.egtrans: 封檐板紧贴在房子外侧。

example.eg: Internet access is sold for a flat rate per month.
example.egtrans: 互联网每月固定收费。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 固定的, 没有变动的

example.eg: A top-spin shot will bounce much higher than a flat shot.
example.egtrans: 上旋球比平击球弹得高得多。

example.eg: I am flat broke.  I need to get a job.
example.egtrans: 我彻底破产了，需要找份工作。

example.eg: He made it back in ten minutes flat.
example.egtrans: 他返回刚好花了十分钟。

example.eg: He turned me down flat.
example.egtrans: 他直截了当地拒绝了我。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 直截了当地, 干脆地

example.eg: He always sings flat.
example.egtrans: 他唱歌音准总是偏低。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.guideword: (music: a note one half tone down) (音乐)

example.eg: She was supposed to play a sharp, but she played a flat.
example.egtrans: 她弹奏时该升半音的，却降了半音。

example.eg: They walked across the flats near the river.
example.egtrans: 他们步行穿过河边的平地。

example.eg: Nobody goes to the flats.  It is dangerous with all the snakes and crocodiles.
example.egtrans: 没人去那片沼泽地，那里有蛇，还有鳄鱼，很危险。

example.eg: She hated high heels and usually wore flats.
example.egtrans: 她讨厌高跟鞋，总是穿平底鞋。

dsense.name: flat [sth]⇒
dsense.guideword: US (musical note: flatten, make flat) (音调)

example.eg: Flatting the pitch of a song can really change its mood.
The trouble with living in an attic flat is that it's cold in winter and boiling hot in the summer.
I couldn't call you last night because my mobile phone had a flat battery and I didn't have my charger on me.
After fixing the house up to our taste we were flat broke.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一文不名的，破产的，身无分文的

example.eg: The old man was wearing a flat cap.
She paid a flat fee of $50 a month for her phone bill.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 固定费用, 统一收费

dsense.name: flat fish
dsense.guideword: (plaice, flounder, turbot, etc.) (鲽鱼、偏口鱼、大菱鲆等)

example.eg: Flat fish like the flounder have both eyes on the same side of their head.
After that 10 mile hike, he was so tired he was flat on his back for an hour.

dsense.name: flat on your back
dsense.guideword: figurative (helpless, defeated) (比喻无助或不再挣扎)

example.eg: We're working flat out to secure the best possible results.
example.egtrans: 我们竭尽全力保证最好的结果。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 尽最大的努力, 竭尽全力, 全力以赴

example.eg: The steering feels light, even when travelling flat out.
example.egtrans: 转向很轻盈，即使是在全速行驶的情况下。

example.eg: She flat out refused to speak to me.
example.egtrans: 她完全拒绝和我对话。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 完全, 彻底, 绝对

example.eg: Stealing the old lady's handbag was flat out wrong.
example.egtrans: 偷那位老太太的手提包绝对是错误的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 直率的, 直截了当的, 断然的
框架柜, 框架集装箱
统一费用, 单一收费率

example.eg: My new flat screen allows me more room for my keyboard.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 平面屏幕（液晶或等离子显示器）

example.eg: It takes a little longer to make a bed with a flat sheet rather than a fitted sheet.

dsense.name: flat tire (US), flat tyre (UK)
dsense.guideword: (deflated wheel cover on a vehicle) (美式拼法)

example.eg: If you drive just a short way with a flat tire, you may have to replace the metal wheel as well.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 没气的轮胎，瘪了的轮胎

example.eg: Some flat-bottomed boats have glass in the bottom so you can view the sea life.
She's so flat-chested that she's often mistaken for a boy.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 胸部平坦的, 平胸的
地平说者, 地平论支持者

example.eg: That store only sells flat-packs, so you have to put everything together yourself.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 扁平包装的家具，平装家具，没有组装的家具

example.eg: I bought a flat-pack entertainment centre; do you want to come over and help me assemble it?
example.egtrans: 我买了一套平装的娱乐中心，你要过来帮我组装吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 扁平包装的, 平装的, 尚未组装的

example.eg: You can hang a flat-screen TV on the wall like a picture.
A flat-share is the cheapest option for students looking to rent privately.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 合租公寓, 分租公寓

example.eg: Being flat-footed can keep you out of the army because you can't march long distances.
I was caught flat-footed when they asked me to make an impromptu speech.
He is flat-footed at parties, but in private conversation his wit shows through.
Their flat-footed strategy cost them the game.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 单调乏味的, 缺乏想象力的

example.eg: He's a flat-footed, plain speaking guy.

dsense.name: flatiron, flat iron
dsense.guideword: historical (pressing iron heated on the stove) (历史用语)

example.eg: The front tyre on my bicycle has gone flat.
This fizzy lemonade has gone flat.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不再起泡，泡沫逐渐平息

dsense.name: have [sth] down flat⇒
dsense.guideword: US, Informal ([sth]: know or understand completely) (非正式用语)

example.eg: After weeks of practice, she had the lyrics to the three most common songs down flat.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 完全了解, 彻底明白

example.eg: You must lay the book out flat in order to photocopy it well.
The doctor told me to lay him flat on the ground so he could check his pulse.
After the punch laid the boxer flat, the referee declared his opponent the winner.
We would've liked a house but we could only afford a small flat.

dsense.name: studio apartment, also UK: studio flat

example.eg: She could only afford to rent a small studio apartment.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 单室公寓, 工作室型公寓
